message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I really appreciate it, but $150 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable spending.  How about $110?  I'm sure we can work something out.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $130. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
Alice,  $130 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to go up to $115.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product for me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $115. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $125. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.
